Name: Wane Armbands
Description:
Seems to provide higher Intellect attributes.

[This gear's advanced attributes will not include Versatility]
Description2$english:
Handcrafted to perfection—though devoid of rare attributes, every detail is imbued with the artisan's soul.

This classic reconnaissance outfit is crafted from comfortable, durable materials, offering exceptional mobility—an adventurer's favorite.

NeedMaterial.Name: Luxury Canvas
NeedMaterial.Description: A flax-spun material utilized in woven fabrications,
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: Beeswax is added to enhance fabric strength.

recipes.Name: Luxury Canvas
recipes.Des: Beeswax is added to enhance fabric strength.

NeedMaterial.Name: Luxury Mulberry Silk
NeedMaterial.Description: A flax-spun material utilized in woven fabrications,
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: Silk-spun thread, crafted from premium raw materials with tactile textures and enhanced by exceptional weaving technology, ensures outstanding quality.

recipes.Name: Luxury Mulberry Silk ×3
recipes.Des: Silk-spun thread, crafted from premium raw materials with tactile textures and enhanced by exceptional weaving technology, ensures outstanding quality.

NeedMaterial.Name: Silkworm Cocoons
NeedMaterial.Description: Collected resource that can be processed further with Life Skills.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: Silk harvested from silkworm cocoons is a prized raw material in the weaving profession.

NeedMaterial.Name: Beeswax
NeedMaterial.Description: An alchemical product primarily used in textile crafting.

NeedMaterial.Name: Beehive
NeedMaterial.Description: A field-harvested resource that can be reprocessed by life professions.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: A rare sweet seasoning, popular in Asterleeds dessert store.

NeedMaterial.Name: Rubber
NeedMaterial.Description: An alchemical product predominantly utilized in construction applications.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: A resilient essence distilled from natural resins, the wellspring of elasticity and protection.

NeedMaterial.Name: Resin

NeedMaterial.Description2$english: Versatile in application, it is primarily used to harden and bond leather with lasting strength.

NeedMaterial.Name: Engram Dust Crystals
NeedMaterial.Description:
An exceptionally rare collected resource.
The higher level of the gatherable, the greater the chance of obtaining it. It is subject to a weekly acquisition limit.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: A rare crystal shimmering with starlight.

NeedMaterial.Name: Sovereign Alloy Shard
NeedMaterial.Description: After collecting enough Sovereign Alloy Shard, you can go to the Artisan Guild and exchange them for level 80 purple quality gear at the gear forging Artisan Harvey.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: This alloy is smelted from materials from powerful monsters and rare minerals, capable of reacting to Engram and emitting a flickering glow. Due to its unique research value, it is highly favored by experts on the Bapharian Legacy.
